§ 305504. Matching grants to Committee The Secretary shall provide matching grants to the Committee for its programs related to historic preservation. The Committee shall match the grants in such a manner and with such funds and services as shall be satisfactory to the Secretary, except that not more than $500,000 may be provided to the Committee in any one fiscal year. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3224.)
